Class ChallengeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • logic.ChallengeModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChallengeInterface

    public class ChallengeModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements ChallengeInterface
    Model class. Interface should interact with this model to perform any operation. This class is the bridge between interface and logic.
